mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.email, u.nickname FROM PAYMENT p Join users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE comments = 'cash' order by p.id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (user_id, comments, inout, amount, cash) VALUES (#{userId}, #{comments}, #{inout}, #{amount}, #{cash})
INSERT INTO PAYMENT (user_id, comments, inout, amount, cash) VALUES (#{userId}, #{comments}, #{inout}, #{amount}, #{cash})
mapper.update: UPDATE users set cash=cash-#{amount} where id=#{userId} And cash>=#{amount}
UPDATE users set cash=cash+#{amount} where id=#{userId} And cash>=#{amount}
